general.description: Milspec is most well known for producing the most advanced systems cores known, with these premium pieces of technology providing dedicated service, power, and protection. Their Orion series systems cores are overtuned to provide a strong balance between defense and power generation, making them the premier combat system used by the elite of House Sirius. The 8601 series is popular with mercenaries who fly light cruisers, with many pairing it with high-performance engines to catch pirates.
